mapper.select: SELECT empId, empName, DATE_FORMAT(empBirth, '%Y-%m-%d') as empBirth, empNo, position, email, phoneNumber, emerNumber, bankName, accountNumber, department, DATE_FORMAT(hireDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as hireDate, status, role FROM employee WHERE empNo = #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET empPassword=#{empPassword}, email=#{email}, phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, emerNumber=#{emerNumber}, bankName=#{bankName}, accountNumber=#{accountNumber} WHERE empNo= #{empNo}
